trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en samling av <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref> objekter.

trans-unit.source: A GridViewColumnCollection object contains a set of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn> objects that are typically used to define the columns of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> object.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt for GridViewColumnCollection inneholder et sett med <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn>objekter som brukes vanligvis til å definere kolonnene i en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A> that defines the layout of data in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>er en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A>som definerer oppsettet for dataene i en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: To receive notification of changes in the collection, monitor the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.CollectionChanged> event that is inherited from <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil bli varslet om endringer i samlingen, kan du overvåke <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.CollectionChanged>hendelse som er arvet fra <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601>.</xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601> </xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Removes all of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> objects from the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner alle de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref> objekter fra den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> to the collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Legger til en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref> -samlingen i den angitte indeksen.

trans-unit.source: This method creates a new item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection> without replacing another item.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden, oppretter et nytt element i den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection>uten å erstatte et annet element.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection>

trans-unit.source: To replace an item in the collection with a new item, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection.SetItem%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil erstatte et element i samlingen med et nytt element, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection.SetItem%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection.SetItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: The position to place the new <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Posisjonen til å plassere den nye <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> to insert.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref> å sette inn.

trans-unit.source: Changes the position of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Flytter en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref> i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: The original position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den opprinnelige plasseringen for den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The new position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den nye posisjonen for den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.CollectionChanged> event when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection"></xref> changes.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.CollectionChanged> hendelsen når den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection"> </xref> endringer.

trans-unit.source: The event arguments.
trans-unit.target: Argumentene hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Removes a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> from the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection"></xref> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner et <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref> fra den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection"> </xref> i den angitte indeksen.

trans-unit.source: The position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> to remove.
trans-unit.target: Posisjonen til det <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref> fjerne.

trans-unit.source: Replaces the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> that is at the specified index with another <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Erstatter det <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref> som er i den angitte indeksen med en annen <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method replaces a column in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection> with a new column.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden erstatter en kolonne i den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection>med en ny kolonne.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection>

trans-unit.source: To insert a new column without replacing another column, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection.InsertItem%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: For å sette inn en ny kolonne, uten å erstatte en annen kolonne, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection.InsertItem%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection.InsertItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: The position at which the new <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> replaces the old <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Posisjonen der den nye <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref> erstatter gamle <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> to place at the specified position.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref> skal plasseres på den angitte posisjonen.
